title: Received Goods Schema
description: This JSON Schema defines the structure of received goods data used in the inventory system. Each entry represents incoming goods from a supplier and is based on prior purchase orders (PO) which in turn relate to BOM and sales orders.

receivedId.description: Primary Key. Unique identifier for the goods receipt entry.

receivedNumber.description: Unique document number for the received goods entry.

receivedCategory.description: Category of receipt, indicating if it's for production use or general purpose.

supplierName.description: Name of the supplier delivering the goods.

date.description: Date when the goods were received (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

currency.description: Currency used for the transaction (e.g., IDR, USD).

itemId.description: ID of the item being received. Typically references the master item data.

unitVendor.description: Unit used by vendor (e.g., ROLL, PCS).

quantityInternal.description: Quantity converted to internal unit measurement.

priceInternal.description: Price per unit in internal unit of measurement.

unitInternal.description: Internal unit used in the system.

orderNumber.description: Sales order number this receipt relates to.

poNumber.description: Purchase Order number that initiated this goods receipt.

poId.description: ID of the related Purchase Order. This receipt is linked to a specific PO which may be based on a BOM.
